tagline.title: BALI WATERFALL TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR FOR VISITING BEST WATERFALL SUCH AS TUKAD CEPUNG, TEGENUNGAN, TIBUMANA AND KANTO LAMPO WATERFALL
tagline.text: BALI WATERFALL TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR FOR VISITING BEST WATERFALL SUCH AS TUKAD CEPUNG, TEGENUNGAN, TIBUMANA AND KANTO LAMPO WATERFALL
tagline.html: BALI WATERFALL TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR FOR VISITING BEST WATERFALL SUCH AS TUKAD CEPUNG, TEGENUNGAN, TIBUMANA AND KANTO LAMPO WATERFALL

description.text: Bali Waterfall Tour is Bali Full Day Tour Packages to enjoy this is a one-day tour that focuses on visiting famous and beautiful waterfalls on the island of Bali such as Tukad Cepung Waterfall, Tegenungan Waterfall, Tibumana Waterfall and the last one is Kanto Lampo Waterfall. This full day waterfall tour is very suitable for those of you who really like waterfalls, while the location of this waterfall is not so far away. First we will pick you up at the hotel in the morning and go straight to Tukad Cepung Waterfall to see the beauty of the waterfall where the water looks like twinkling when exposed to light, and proceed to Tegenungan waterfall which is very popular in the Ubud area, and continued with lunch with Indonesian food, finished enjoying lunch the tour continued to Tibumana waterfall to see the uniqueness of this waterfall is on the cliffs where the water flows, where the cliffs are not straight but tilted inward which makes it appear as if there is a cave in the waterfall and continued to visit Kanto Lampo waterfall which was very beautiful and unique with stones that are tilted and an uneven surface looks like a stone steps, where falling water will pass through the rocks. An amazing full day tour to visit a waterfall which is very famous for its incomparable natural beauty, accompanied by a friendly and experienced driver will make the tour even more enjoyable and will certainly give a meaningful impression in this Bali Waterfall Tour.

An amazing full day tour to visit a waterfall which is very famous for its incomparable natural beauty, accompanied by a friendly and experienced driver will make the tour even more enjoyable and will certainly give a meaningful impression in this Bali Waterfall Tour.

title.title: Tukad Cepung Waterfall | Bali Waterfall Tour

image.title: Bali Waterfall Tour | Tukad Cepung Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tukad Cepung Waterfall is beautiful waterfall located in tembuku sub-district, bangli province. classified as best site for Bali Waterfall Tour that was just introduced a few years ago, because the beauty of the waterfall makes this tourist attraction famous now. the scenery offered in this place is so beautiful, and you can swim in this place with really clear water with a calm atmosphere. Waterfall tourism objects are always in great demand by tourists who yearn for stunning natural beauty, including this Tukad Cepung waterfall tour, often used as a place for photo spots that produce photo objects that are very fitting, with the right lighting that will make you look beautiful. the photo looks so instagramable, A waterfall that is very beautiful with the uniqueness of the water that twinkles when exposed to sunlight

image.title: Bali Waterfall Tour | Tegenungan Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegenungan Waterfall is the beauty and hidden waterfall in Ubud village, exactly located in Tegenungan Kemenuh town, District Sukawati, Gianyar. Is the best and famous waterfall featured in this Bali Waterfall Tour. The water is furthermore clean and clear. It is suitable for washing or just playing around water and the most interesting Waterfall to visit during your holiday in Bali Islands. Tegenungan waterfall has always made a special impression in the hearts of tourists who have visited here, so it is no wonder that the Tegenungan waterfall tourist attraction has become popular among foreign and domestic tourists. Has become the most frequently visited waterfall tourist attraction on the island of Bali. A very famous waterfall in Ubud village with the natural beauty around the waterfall which is very charming

image.title: Bali Waterfall Tour | Tibumana Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tibumana Waterfall is a natural tourism that offers a beautiful and natural waterfall view, located at Banjar Bangun Lebah Kawan, Apuan Village, Bangli Regency. The location is somewhat hidden and rarely known by tourists so that Tibumana Waterfall is relatively quiet and is rather rarely visited by tourists and become best site that include in Bali Waterfall Tour. The uniqueness of this waterfall is on the cliffs where the water flows, where the cliffs are not straight but tilted inward which makes it appear as if there is a cave in the waterfall. The tibumana waterfall is not as high as other waterfalls where the height is only about 20 meters. Another uniqueness where in the dry season you will see only the water flowing in one lane, but if the rainy season will flow in two lanes in one cliff, A very memorable experience on this Bali Waterfall Tour

The tibumana waterfall is not as high as other waterfalls where the height is only about 20 meters. Another uniqueness where in the dry season you will see only the water flowing in one lane, but if the rainy season will flow in two lanes in one cliff, A very memorable experience on this Bali Waterfall Tour

title.title: Kanto Lampo Waterfall | Bali Waterfall Tour

image.title: Bali Waterfall Tour | Kanto Lampo Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kanto Lampo Waterfall is beautiful waterfall tourist attraction located in Beng Village, Gianyar, Bali. Where this waterfall offers beautiful and natural natural beauty, where the water from this waterfall is very clear and the location is in the lowlands, and perfect site featured in this Bali Waterfall Tour. Around the waterfall there are shady trees that make the atmosphere not hot and certainly cool, because the coolness doesn't feel tired when walking down the path to reach Kanto Lampo Waterfall. where the uniqueness is in the waterfall rocks, where there are stones that are tilted and an uneven surface looks like a stone steps, where falling water will pass through the rocks. and make the sound of gurgling water that sings to greet and tell that this is a phenomenal waterfall, A natural beauty that radiates from this fantastic waterfall

price.title: Bali Waterfall Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Waterfall Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Bali Waterfall Tour price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,150,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee, English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Visit Tukad Cepung Waterfall
Visit Kanto Lampo Waterfall

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
